field.name: first person left side mix
field.definition: for first person sounds to the left of you

field.name: first person middle mix
field.definition: for first person sounds between your ears

field.name: first person right side mix
field.definition: for first person sounds to the right of you

field.name: scary target threhold
field.help: A target of this scariness is offically considered scary (by combat dialogue, etc.)

field.name: scary weapon threhold
field.help: A weapon of this scariness is offically considered scary (by combat dialogue, etc.)

field.name: magnetism friction
field.help: how much the crosshair slows over enemies

field.name: magnetism adhesion
field.help: how much the crosshair sticks to enemies

field.name: inconsequential target scale
field.help: scales magnetism level for inconsequential targets like infection forms

field.name: crosshair location
field.help: -1..1, 0 is middle of the screen

field.name: seconds to start
field.help: how long you must be pegged before you start sprinting

field.name: seconds to full speed
field.help: how long you must sprint before you reach top speed

field.name: decay rate
field.help: how fast being unpegged decays the timer (seconds per second)

field.name: full speed multiplier
field.help: how much faster we actually go when at full sprint

field.name: pegged magnitude
field.help: how far the stick needs to be pressed before being considered pegged

field.name: pegged angular threshold
field.help: how far off straight up (in degrees) we consider pegged

field.name: look peg threshold [0,1]
field.help: magnitude of yaw for pegged acceleration to kick in

field.name: look yaw acceleration time
field.help: time for a pegged look to reach maximum effect

field.name: look yaw acceleration scale
field.help: maximum effect of a pegged look (scales last value in the look function below)

field.name: look pitch acceleration time
field.help: time for a pegged look to reach maximum effect

field.name: look pitch acceleration scale
field.help: maximum effect of a pegged look (scales last value in the look function below)

field.name: look autolevelling scale
field.help: 1 is fast, 0 is none, >1 will probably be really fast

field.name: minimum autolevelling ticks
field.help: amount of time player needs to move and not look up or down for autolevelling to kick in

field.name: minimum angle for vehicle flipping
field.help: 0 means the vehicle's up vector is along the ground, 90 means the up vector is pointing straight up

field.name: minimum action hold time
field.help: time that player needs to press ACTION to register as a HOLD

field.name: health
field.definition: scale values for enemy health and damage settings

field.name: easy enemy damage
field.help: enemy damage multiplier on easy difficulty

field.name: normal enemy damage
field.help: enemy damage multiplier on normal difficulty

field.name: hard enemy damage
field.help: enemy damage multiplier on hard difficulty

field.name: imposs. enemy damage

field.help: toughness of infection forms (may be negative) on easy difficulty

field.help: enemy rate of fire scale on normal difficulty

field.name: hard rate of fire
field.help: enemy rate of fire scale on hard difficulty

field.help: enemy projectile error scale, as a fraction of their base firing error. on easy difficulty

field.help: enemy projectile error scale, as a fraction of their base firing error. on hard difficulty

field.name: imposs. projectile error
field.help: enemy projectile error scale, as a fraction of their base firing error. on impossible difficulty

field.help: enemy burst error scale; reduces intra-burst shot distance. on easy difficulty

field.help: enemy burst error scale; reduces intra-burst shot distance. on hard difficulty

field.help: enemy new-target delay scale factor. on easy difficulty

field.help: enemy new-target delay scale factor. on hard difficulty

field.help: enemy new-target delay scale factor. on impossible difficulty

field.name: easy burst separation
field.help: delay time between bursts scale factor for enemies. on easy difficulty

field.help: delay time between bursts scale factor for enemies. on hard difficulty

field.help: delay time between bursts scale factor for enemies. on impossible difficulty

field.name: easy target tracking
field.help: additional target tracking fraction for enemies. on easy difficulty

field.help: additional target tracking fraction for enemies. on normal difficulty

field.name: hard target tracking
field.help: additional target tracking fraction for enemies. on hard difficulty

field.help: additional target tracking fraction for enemies. on impossible difficulty

field.name: easy target leading
field.help: additional target leading fraction for enemies. on easy difficulty

field.help: additional target leading fraction for enemies. on hard difficulty

field.name: easy overcharge chance
field.help: overcharge chance scale factor for enemies. on easy difficulty

field.name: normal overcharge chance
field.help: overcharge chance scale factor for enemies. on normal difficulty

field.name: hard overcharge chance
field.help: overcharge chance scale factor for enemies. on hard difficulty

field.name: imposs. overcharge chance
field.help: overcharge chance scale factor for enemies. on impossible difficulty

field.name: easy special fire delay
field.help: delay between special-fire shots (overcharge, banshee bombs) scale factor for enemies. on easy difficulty

field.name: normal special fire delay
field.help: delay between special-fire shots (overcharge, banshee bombs) scale factor for enemies. on normal difficulty

field.name: hard special fire delay
field.help: delay between special-fire shots (overcharge, banshee bombs) scale factor for enemies. on hard difficulty

field.name: imposs. special fire delay
field.help: delay between special-fire shots (overcharge, banshee bombs) scale factor for enemies. on impossible difficulty

field.name: easy guidance vs player
field.help: guidance velocity scale factor for all projectiles targeted on a player. on easy difficulty

field.name: normal guidance vs player
field.help: guidance velocity scale factor for all projectiles targeted on a player. on normal difficulty

field.name: hard guidance vs player
field.help: guidance velocity scale factor for all projectiles targeted on a player. on hard difficulty

field.name: imposs. guidance vs player
field.help: guidance velocity scale factor for all projectiles targeted on a player. on impossible difficulty

field.name: easy melee delay base
field.help: delay period added to all melee attacks, even when berserk. on easy difficulty

field.name: normal melee delay base
field.help: delay period added to all melee attacks, even when berserk. on normal difficulty

field.name: hard melee delay base
field.help: delay period added to all melee attacks, even when berserk. on hard difficulty

field.name: imposs. melee delay base
field.help: delay period added to all melee attacks, even when berserk. on impossible difficulty

field.name: easy melee delay scale
field.help: multiplier for all existing non-berserk melee delay times. on easy difficulty

field.name: normal melee delay scale
field.help: multiplier for all existing non-berserk melee delay times. on normal difficulty

field.name: hard melee delay scale
field.help: multiplier for all existing non-berserk melee delay times. on hard difficulty

field.name: imposs. melee delay scale
field.help: multiplier for all existing non-berserk melee delay times. on impossible difficulty

field.name: grenades
field.definition: difficulty-affecting values for enemy grenade behavior

field.name: easy grenade chance scale
field.help: scale factor affecting the desicions to throw a grenade. on easy difficulty

field.name: normal grenade chance scale
field.help: scale factor affecting the desicions to throw a grenade. on normal difficulty

field.name: hard grenade chance scale
field.help: scale factor affecting the desicions to throw a grenade. on hard difficulty

field.name: imposs. grenade chance scale
field.help: scale factor affecting the desicions to throw a grenade. on impossible difficulty

field.name: easy grenade timer scale
field.help: scale factor affecting the delay period between grenades thrown from the same encounter (lower is more often). on easy difficulty

field.name: normal grenade timer scale
field.help: scale factor affecting the delay period between grenades thrown from the same encounter (lower is more often). on normal difficulty

field.name: hard grenade timer scale
field.help: scale factor affecting the delay period between grenades thrown from the same encounter (lower is more often). on hard difficulty

field.name: imposs. grenade timer scale
field.help: scale factor affecting the delay period between grenades thrown from the same encounter (lower is more often). on impossible difficulty

field.name: easy major upgrade (normal)
field.help: fraction of actors upgraded to their major variant. on easy difficulty

field.name: normal major upgrade (normal)
field.help: fraction of actors upgraded to their major variant. on normal difficulty

field.name: hard major upgrade (normal)
field.help: fraction of actors upgraded to their major variant. on hard difficulty

field.name: imposs. major upgrade (normal)
field.help: fraction of actors upgraded to their major variant. on impossible difficulty

field.name: easy major upgrade (few)
field.help: fraction of actors upgraded to their major variant when mix = normal. on easy difficulty

field.name: normal major upgrade (few)
field.help: fraction of actors upgraded to their major variant when mix = normal. on normal difficulty

field.name: hard major upgrade (few)
field.help: fraction of actors upgraded to their major variant when mix = normal. on hard difficulty

field.name: imposs. major upgrade (few)
field.help: fraction of actors upgraded to their major variant when mix = normal. on impossible difficulty

field.name: easy major upgrade (many)
field.help: fraction of actors upgraded to their major variant when mix = many. on easy difficulty

field.name: normal major upgrade (many)
field.help: fraction of actors upgraded to their major variant when mix = many. on normal difficulty

field.name: hard major upgrade (many)
field.help: fraction of actors upgraded to their major variant when mix = many. on hard difficulty

field.name: imposs. major upgrade (many)
field.help: fraction of actors upgraded to their major variant when mix = many. on impossible difficulty

field.name: easy player vehicle ram chance
field.help: Chance of deciding to ram the player in a vehicle on easy difficulty

field.name: normal player vehicle ram chance
field.help: Chance of deciding to ram the player in a vehicle on normal difficulty

field.name: hard player vehicle ram chance
field.help: Chance of deciding to ram the player in a vehicle on hard difficulty

field.name: imposs. player vehicle ram chance
field.help: Chance of deciding to ram the player in a vehicle on impossible difficulty

field.name: function textures
field.definition: Used internally by the rasterizer. (Do not change unless you know what you're doing!)

field.name: default textures
field.definition: Used internally by the rasterizer - additive, multiplicative, detail, vector. (Do not change ever, period.)

field.name: experimental textures
field.definition: Used internally by the rasterizer. (Used by Bernie's experimental shaders.)

field.name: global shader
field.definition: Used for layers that need to do something for other layers to work correctly if the layer is disabled, also used for active-camo, etc.

field.name: PC textures
field.definition: The PC can't use 3D textures, so we use this instead.

field.name: stun movement penalty
field.help: 1.0 prevents moving while stunned

field.name: stun turning penalty
field.help: 1.0 prevents turning while stunned

field.name: stun jumping penalty
field.help: 1.0 prevents jumping while stunned

field.name: minimum stun time
field.help: all stunning damage will last for at least this long

field.name: maximum stun time
field.help: no stunning damage will last for longer than this

field.name: vehicle terrain parameters
field.definition: the following fields modify the way a vehicle drives over terrain of this material type.

field.name: ground friction scale
field.help: fraction of original velocity parallel to the ground after one tick

field.name: ground friction normal k1 scale
field.help: cosine of angle at which friction falls off

field.name: ground friction normal k0 scale
field.help: cosine of angle at which friction is zero

field.name: ground depth scale
field.help: depth a point mass rests in the ground

field.name: ground damp fraction scale
field.help: fraction of original velocity perpendicular to the ground after one tick

field.name: sweetener inheritance flags
field.definition: when a sweetener inheritance flag is set the sound\effect is not inherited from the parent material. If you leave the sweetener blank and set the flag than no effect\sound will play
